Text: The right to access my personal information\nYou may have the right to access the personal information that we collect about you. Depending on the jurisdiction, we may be required to provide this information to you (to the extent technically feasible) in an electronic format that is commonly used, is easily understandable to the average consumer, and can be transferred to another entity at your request without hindrance. You may also have the right to request details regarding the information that we collect about you, including the categories of personal information that we collect, the sources of this personal information, our purposes for collecting and using this personal information, and the entities to which we disclose this personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: The right to delete my personal information\nYou may have the right to delete personal information that we have collected about you. Depending on the jurisdiction, upon receiving a request for deletion, we may be obligated to request that service providers, contractors, and other third parties delete your personal information, as well. However, our obligation to honor your request to delete may be limited where our continued processing of your personal information is necessary for such purposes as: complying with a legal obligation; establishing, exercising, or defending legal claims; engaging in public or peer-reviewed scientific, historical, or statistical research; exercising the rights of freedom of speech, freedom of expression and information, and other rights provided for by law; fulfilling a contract between you and our business; and carrying out tasks in the public interest.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: The right to correct or amend my personal information\nYou may have the right to correct or rectify inaccurate or incomplete personal information that we have on file about you. Such correction or rectification may take into account the nature of the personal information and our purposes for processing it.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: The right to limit the use of my “sensitive” personal information\nYou may have the right to limit our use of your “sensitive” personal information. “Sensitive” personal information may include information revealing your racial or ethnic origin, religious or philosophical beliefs, political opinions, or union membership; genetic data; biometric data for the purpose of uniquely identifying you; information concerning your health, sex life, or sexual orientation; information revealing your precise geolocation; and information revealing certain sensitive identification numbers (e.g., social security number, passport number) or financial information (e.g., bank account number in combination with a password). Depending on the jurisdiction, and subject to various exceptions, we may be prohibited from processing your sensitive personal information or limited to processing your sensitive personal information to the extent necessary to perform the services or provide the goods reasonably expected by an average consumer who requests those goods or services.
Label: Description of Right to Limit use of PI

Text: The right to opt-out of the sale or “sharing” of my personal information\nYou may have the right to withdraw your consent for, or opt-out of, our sale or sharing of your personal information at any time. Depending on the jurisdiction, a “sale” might encompass our business selling, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, your personal information to a third party for monetary or other valuable consideration. Relatedly, “sharing” might entail our business sharing, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, your personal information to a third party for cross-context behavioral advertising, whether or not for monetary or other valuable consideration, including transactions between our business and a third party for cross-context behavioral advertising for the benefit of a business in which no money is exchanged.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text:
The right to opt-out of the sale or “sharing” of my personal information
You may have the right to withdraw your consent for, or opt-out of, our sale or sharing of your personal information at any time. Depending on the jurisdiction, a “sale” might encompass our business selling, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, your personal information to a third party for monetary or other valuable consideration. Relatedly, “sharing” might entail our business sharing, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, your personal information to a third party for cross-context behavioral advertising, whether or not for monetary or other valuable consideration, including transactions between our business and a third party for cross-context behavioral advertising for the benefit of a business in which no money is exchanged.

The right to opt-out of the use of my personal information for targeted advertising purposes
You may have the right to withdraw your consent for, or opt-out of, our use of your personal information for purposes of targeted advertising. Depending on the jurisdiction, targeted advertising may entail any advertisement that is selected for you based on personal information obtained or inferred over time from your activities over nonaffiliated websites, applications, or services.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Strictly Necessary Cookies\nAlways Active\nThese cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Performance Cookies\nPerformance Cookies\nThese cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Functional Cookies\nFunctional Cookies\nThese cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Targeting Cookies\nTargeting Cookies\nThese cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed
